item.description:
THE IRA’S SINGLES EVENTS

FIRST ANNUAL

“BRING IN SPRING DANCE” WITH TERRIFIC HAPPY HOUR FOOD AND LIBATIONS,

LIVE MUSIC TO DANCE THE NIGHT AWAY!!!!



The Details:


DATE: Saturday, March 20, “ First day of Spring, of course. “ 5 p.m. to ?

LOCATION: Angelico’s Lake House Restaurant ,81 North Main Street,
East Hampton, CT 06424-1433,(860) 267-1276. ( It is about 20 min. from Hartford, and well worth the short drive) http://www.angelicosl...

MUSIC DETAILS: The name of the band is Blues On The Side. -Hartford Advocates Best Blues Band in 2008. They are great, and get the crowd going for sure. Please see: http://www.bluesonthe...





FOOD AND LIBATIONS: The terrific specials are from 5 p.m. to 7p.m. A regular dinner menu is available as well. Specials are listed below. How cool is: Mac & Cheese with Lobster, now that is Special for sure…………..

R.S.V.P Information: On or before: Wednesday March 17.
Mistrchrming@aol.com . Questions: 860-604-5792


HAPPY HOUR BAR SPECIALS

Colossal Shrimp 2.00 each Buffalo Chicken Dip 3.00 Fried Calamari 3.00 Cheeseburger 3.00 Fish & Chips 3.00 Sweet Potato Fries 3.00 Fried Ravioli 3.00 Buffalo Popcorn Shrimp 3.00 Mac & Cheese with Lobster 3.00 Buffalo Wings 3.00


Martini 4.99 Margarita 4.99 Frozen Drinks 4.99 Domestic Bottles 2.99 Imported Bottles 3.99 Draft Pints 2.99 Guinness Pint 3.99

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: The Ira's First Annual " Bring In Spring Dance" With Terrific Happy Hour Food
